GeneralInfo.Name: AtmoWin
GeneralInfo.Author: Angie05 , RickDB , legnod (installer), azzuro(Teensy), André Weber, Matthiaz, MacGyver2k, swifty
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
AtmoWin Software for Ambilight systeml. No need to switch AERO off anymore!
AtmoWin needs an additional plugin (MPCoreChanger & Atmolight) which will be installed/updated automatically while installing!!!
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
Fix of OK/Cancel button dialog for Atmoduino hardware
Color picker / greyscale adjustment fixes merged from SEDU mod (angie05).
Bugfix for registry saving the Atmoduino channels.
GeneralInfo.Tags: sedu-board, atmowin, ws2801, ambilight, teensy 2, atmoduino, ambilight, led

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If it has .exe extension the will be executed. If it has .dll extension it's started like MP plugin configuration.

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.

GeneralInfo.Author: Angie05 , RickDB , legnod (installer), azzuro(Teensy), André Weber, Matthiaz, MacGyver2k, swifty, BassFan, NevCairiel
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
AtmoWin Software for Ambilight systeml. No need to switch AERO off anymore!
AtmoWin needs an additional plugin (MPCoreChanger & Atmolight) which will be installed/updated automatically while installing!!!
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Version 1.0.0.6 BugsFix. (BassFan) Atmoduino V2 (NevCairiel) + rework the import (Azzuro) Win8 Desktop Duplication API (NevCairiel) Max zone correction (Nevcairiel) Increase capture to 170x96 for Release_16x9 build (default build/Release is always 64x48) (NevCairiel)
GeneralInfo.Tags: sedu-board, atmowin, ws2801, ambilight, teensy 2, atmoduino, ambilight, led

GeneralInfo.Name: AtmoWin
GeneralInfo.Author: Angie05 , RickDB , legnod (installer), azzuro(Teensy), André Weber, Matthiaz, MacGyver2k, swifty, BassFan, NevCairiel
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
AtmoWin Software for Ambilight systeml.
AtmoWin needs an additional plugin : Atmolight: Manage Atmowin MPCoreChanger : For MP <1.6 only.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Version 1.0.0.7 : Make Atmowin totally "Portable", no more Hardcoded path. for using without MediaPortal. (BassFan) - Language : If no language found, English language is created. (BassFan) - Setting : use the file under root path where is executed Atmowin.exe (BassFan) Deactivate the "Save" button for profile, available only when new profile is created, make misunderstanding because used as "Save setting" (BassFan) Fixed various error (BassFan)
GeneralInfo.Tags: sedu-board, atmowin, ws2801, ambilight, teensy 2, atmoduino, ambilight, led

GeneralInfo.Name: AtmoWin
GeneralInfo.Author: Angie05 , RickDB , legnod (installer), azzuro(Teensy), André Weber, Matthiaz, MacGyver2k, swifty, BassFan, NevCairiel
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
AtmoWin Software for Ambilight systeml.
AtmoWin needs an additional plugin :
Atmolight: Manage Atmowin
If MediaPortal < Version 1.6
MPCoreChanger
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
Version 1.0.0.9 :
Correction of the gradient slider on color gradient dialog. (Azzuro)
Update platform project to VS120.
translate few internal source text.
set capturesize to 96x54 for 16x9 build
set max capture to 300. ( need testing !)
GeneralInfo.Tags: sedu-board, atmowin, ws2801, ambilight, teensy 2, atmoduino, ambilight, led
